keyword: how many calories are in a tablespoon of sugar
title: How Many Calories Are in a Tablespoon of Sugar?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in a tablespoon of sugar—about 49 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs and sugars for granulated white sugar.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Tablespoon of Sugar?
assumptions: Granulated white sugar, level tablespoon (≈12.5 g), no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type (e.g., brown, powdered), density, and brand; measurements can differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of granulated sugar provides about 49 calories, all from simple carbohydrates.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged sugars.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a tablespoon of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 49 calories for one level tablespoon of granulated white sugar.
Yes, it's nearly 100% carbohydrates, with 12.5 g carbs and sugars per tablespoon.

faqs.q: How does brown sugar compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar at about 51 kcal per tablespoon, due to added molasses for flavor.

faqs.q: Does the type of sugar affect calories?
faqs.a: Most sugars are around 4 kcal per gram, but density and additives can vary totals slightly.

faqs.q: What's the sodium or fat in sugar?
faqs.a: Zero fat, protein, fiber, cholesterol, and sodium—pure energy from carbs.
